EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Honeywell GoDirect Customer Advisory Board Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell GoDirect Customer Advisory Board Meeting. Please save this email for future reference.
Where: Honeywell Phoenix Sky Harbor Office (We will need access to the lab environment for demonstrations.)
When: • Tuesday, June 12 – Welcome Cocktail Reception • Wednesday, June 13 – Meeting and Dinner • Thursday, June 14 – Meeting (ends at noon)
We look forward to seeing you in June!
Sincerely, Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
